org.radarbase.management.security.jwt

Interface JwtAccessTokenConverter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.AccessTokenConverter, org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.TokenEnhancer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagementPortalJwtAccessTokenConverter

    public interface JwtAccessTokenConverter
extends org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.TokenEnhancer, org.springframework.security.oauth2.provider.token.AccessTokenConverter
    Interface of a JwtAccessTokenConverter functions.

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> decode(java.lang.String token)
        Decodes and verifies a JWT token string and extracts claims into a Map.

        Returns:
        claims of decoded token.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • isRefreshToken

        boolean isRefreshToken(org.springframework.security.oauth2.common.OAuth2AccessToken token)
        Checks whether a token is access-token or refresh-token. Based on additional-information ati which contains the reference to access token of a refresh token.
